sources.title: 1951 - The Well - El pozo de la angustia - Russell Rouse
sources.description: 1951 - The Well - El pozo de la angustia  - Russell Rouse

sources.title: The Well (1951)
sources.description: In a racially mixed American town, a five-year-old black girl falls unnoticed into a hidden, forgotten well on her way to school. Having nothing better to go on, the police follow up a report that the child was seen with a white stranger, and rumors run wild. Before hapless, innocent Claude Packard is even found, popular hysteria has him tried and convicted. But is he guilty? Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-well-1951/

metadata.Plot: In a racially-mixed American town, a 5-year-old black girl falls unnoticed into a hidden, forgotten well on her way to school. With nothing better to go on, the police follow up a report that the child was seen with a white stranger, and rumors run wild. Before hapless, innocent Claude Packard is even found, popular hysteria has him tried and convicted. But Packard's troubles pale by comparison as ever more-inflated rumors uncap the well of racial tensions and mob violence. And young Carolyn Crawford, forgotten by most, is still missing.
metadata.Actors: Gwendolyn Laster, Richard Rober, Maidie Norman
